column5: Where is the hog trough located? Is it in the Big M bay? I think I know the other spots you refer to. We leave on Sunday. Hope there is some good weather left up there.

Hi Brad! Yes, the hog trough is located in Big M. I wasn't with the guys in our group that went up there this year, but they said it was fantastic. Let me know how you do. I wonder if the water levels have dropped any in the last month? LOL Fred
